txt.en: Flowers to plant can be found throughout the neighbourhoods of the Kingstead.\n\nYou should gather the flowers.

'Have you noticed some of the barren planters around? I have as well. As luck would have it, a gardener just brought a large batch of lovely flowers for us to plant around the village. Will you help with the planting?'
Flower planters can be found throughout the neighbourhoods of the Rohan Kingstead.\n\nYou should plant flowers in the planters.
When neighbours work together, the Households of the Rohan Kingstead will glisten upon the rolling plains.
